Text: Forget to mention, just go to the developer's website and download the free SP1 and upgrade to version 3.1.3.7

Important! Only after you've upgraded to v3.1.3.7 (Sp1) will you be able to compile the runways with the new version of MakeRwys.exe because the older version will NOT create a runways.xml file. The update of SP1 is a free download from developers website.
